programme.title: ila 部落住一晚 S2
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 钢铁大叔 黄仲昆 及 黄远跟着 民雄 到部落玩啰！民雄带着黄仲昆父子前往花莲的奇美部落体验当地特有的 文化泛舟旅程。他们一起感受有「活的博物馆」之称的阿美族奇美部落的特殊游程。这趟旅程更像是‘'耍Man之旅‘' - 砍木头、爬树、撒网捕鱼。再去一趟既冒险又有文化史观的‘'泛舟行程‘'！这个小小的部落是传说中阿美族文化的发源地。至今延续的男子阶级制度,让黄仲昆父子感受了特有的旅行经验。今年夏天你还在找能玩水有文青风的行程吗？.

Apart from his magic skill, Kyle will be the dare devil person in the kitchen as he will be ready to take up extreme challenges which most of us may not be willing to do.

programme.title: Ramprasad Ki Tehrvi
programme.desc: After Ramprasad's untimely demise, his family comes together under one roof for a period of thirteen days. During this time, their insecurities and problems come to the forefront.

programme.title: Ninaivil Nindravai S1
programme.desc: Compilation of Evergreen Classic songs.

programme.title: Oru Nodiyil S2
programme.desc: 48-year-old Noel used to live the highflyer life and was super fit as a young man. His life changed in an instant when doctors found a blood clot in the size of a golf ball on the right side of his brain. In this episode, Kartik Anand depicts Noel as a strong individual who is determined to not give up on himself and his goals.

programme.title: Oru Nodiyil S2
programme.desc: Dr Navin Nair was born a premature baby and was diagnosed with Cerebral Palsy. He had to go through a leg surgery to prevent his legs from criss-crossing and an eye surgery to fix the nerves at the back of his eye socket. He faced huge challenges in school and had to be carried to class. His school mates bullied him and made fun of him. In this episode, Pragadesh depicts Navin overcoming the obstacles and challenges in his life and emerging stronger.

programme.title: Kathir
programme.desc: The protagonist's transformation about the perspective of life through an optimistic influence from an elderly woman, who has an inspiring past.

programme.title: Anjaraipetti S9
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti takes cookery onto a new level, transforming the home cooks into passionate chefs. The show helps viewers hone their culinary skills and brings new flavours to their kitchens.

programme.title: Ming Lee c/o Manickam
programme.desc: A Chinese boy fostered in an Indian family? Yes! Ming Lee, a foster child, becomes an unexpected but necessary part of the Manickam family. Having been neglected form a young age, Ming Lee was brought up by his troubled parents, till the home had found the perfect foster family for him - the Manickams. An amusing story of how a young boy is trying to fit in a peculiar family with different people with the added challenge of cultural and language differences.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi
programme.desc: Tamil Seithi focuses primarily on local and international news, information and current affairs. Catch the online news portal at http://seithi.mediacorp.sg/.

programme.title: Veerasingam
programme.desc: Popular actor Veera, a university student, is tasked to learn Silambattam for his next Superhero drama series. However, he is taken aback when his father Karunakaran shows great displeasure and urges him to stay away from the ancient martial arts when he excitedly shared the news with him.

programme.title: Oru Naal Koothu
programme.desc: In the current times, we are so dependent on online shopping for our outfits and accessories, especially for special occasions. What happens if your order does not come in on time, and you need to do last-minute shopping to get your stuff for the event the next day.

programme.title: Mei
programme.desc: The shipment of smuggled diamonds found to be missing in Azerbaijan sparks off an extensive search for Selvaragavan. Arjun investigates a possible mole within his department . Mayuri harbours a secret which threatens to tear the family apart.

programme.title: Vanjam
programme.desc: Ramalingam was leading the perfect life - a sweet wife, 2 beautiful daughters and an impeccable reputation. He is not wealthy, but had enough to lead a decent and honorable life with his family. But on one fateful night, everything crumbles to dust.
